article:
Today is Sunday. Mike and Peter _ go to school. Listen! They are talking about the life in the future in the room.
" _ will the world be like" asks Peter. "I think that the world will be a _ place to live in. And we will _ machines and robots at home. They will help us do lots of _ . " says Mike.
"The robots will help _ cook dinner, clean the houses and look after the old people. I think there will _ a kind of medicine   and it can make me live more than 100 years ," Peter says.
"What will you do then?" asks Mike.
"Then I will take my great - grandchildren to the moon," says Peter. "The moon? I will go to the Mars   with my wife ," says Mike.
